io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event

Class EffectsEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event.Event
      • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event.EffectsEvent

  • public class EffectsEvent
extends Event
    Listens for changes to either the effect currently being displayed, or changes to the effects installed on the Nanoleaf device.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int EFFECTS_LIST_ATTRIBUTE
      Triggered when the list of effects on a Nanoleaf device changes, such as when effects are added/deleted
      static int SELECTED_EFFECT_ATTRIBUTE
      Triggered when the selected effect changes (i.e., another effect is selected)

      • Fields inherited from class io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event.Event

        UNKNOWN_ATTRIBUTE
